name: Sperms & Ladders (1m x 1m)
description:
The Sperm & Ladders game has been developed to facilitate learning about sex, relationships and HIV in an interactive and fun way, while incorporating robust information and messages.
The game can be used in a structured and guided setting, utilising other activities to support the messages provided in the different squares of the board. Additional suggestions for links with
curriculum subjects and activities are provided to increase the breadth of learning possible using the game.
The game can also be used in an informal way, with people playing intuitively which supports team building, informal discussion and often develops people’s understanding in a different way to
structured sessions because the team players use their experiences to present and develop their messages.
Other elements of learning can be built into structured use of the game – including:
• numeracy – by asking participants to work out what number they will move to on each throw of the dice
• literacy – reading aloud the information on each square and in the activities
• team building – when the game is played in teams the concept of waiting your turn, helping team mates etc can be structured into the game

name: Love Sex Hate STI's Tee
description:
This original and daring health awareness tee shirt has been designed specifically for us to sell from 2012.
All proceeds go to our great sexual health charity LASS.

Shipping is £1.00 or 75p with others within the UK.

Available in small, medium or large.

name: Hand Made Beaded Red Ribbon Brooch
description:
These lovingly hand crafted banner style brooches show understanding and awareness of those living with and affected by HIV and AIDS in a funky new way.

All money goes toward the charity award 'highly commended' HIV charity LASS.

Shipping is free for small items

name: Red Ribbon Badge
description:
Wear your red ribbon badge with pride to show support and understanding for those living with or affected by HIV and AIDS.

These are only £2 each and the money goes to help and support those living with or affected by HIV and AIDS.

Shipping is free for small items
